verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He brought them forth
With silver and gold
And there were not
many feeble among their tribe

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He gave a cloud for covering
And fire by the night
He opened up the rock
And the waters gushed forth
Like a river in dry places

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And he brought forth his people with joy
And he brought forth his people with joy
He brought them forth with gladness
He brought forth his people with joy
